â€œ2nd Strongest bud I've had after Solstice's The White and Freak UV Nature's The White. #Seattle/Tacoma
I got mines from Seattles Finest at NWCM in White Center (ratcity). Just put it like this...Narcotics. That's the only way I can describe the eurphoria. A dizzying sensational head high with a spaced out stuck on stupid, swear your in deep thought, nodding off, lay ya down, get back up again and raid the fridge, I'm...â€

â€œThis is a G13 Labs Strain that I received as a freebie and grew and I have to say it was an excellent strain..I am more a Sativa smoker but this Indica cross of Blueberry and White Widow was an excellent cross..the plant was a typical short indica, but the the Calyxes turned a pretty violet blue color..smoke was really smooth and the high was just right..not to strong..more of a nice creeper..no hangover from what I ...â€

â€œI take your time seriously, so I only write about 5 Star medicine, and Blue Venom makes the cut into this elite group. The bud structure resembles White Widow in that the bus are tight and conical, with white crystals sparkling throughout their little bodies. I can feel the soaring White Widow effects, too, but with a refreshing Blueberry aftertaste that is both sweet and soothing. I've only taken three hits, and tha...â€

â€œThis strain is the best strain I've smoked yet honestly. When i first got my hands on it I was very satisfied with the way it looked, real leafy and crystaly with a wonderful piney scent to it. This strain has beautiful orange hairs with a light tent green and a darker green nugs. It smokes like a dream, smooth and tastes so lovely. The high is perfect. A mix between sativia and indica. Put me to sleep like a baby, b...â€
â€œThis strain is good to smoke when you are feeling tired or down. It makes you feel alive and energetic.â€

â€œObtained at Altai Mountain Organics in the NW Cannabis Market in Seattle. This strain has a great sweetish smell, with the typical Blueberry distinctiveness. White Widow comes through as relaxation gently settles. For a fast, relaxing smoke, this will take worries and pain away, without knocking you out.â€
â€œit helps alot on my stomach pain..works almost as an anti-acid and a sleep aid.â€
â€œBe careful newbies this will give your chest some pressure and you will feel very energetic..â€
â€œBe careful newbies this will give your chest some pressure and you will feel very energetic..â€

â€œblue venom completely surprised me. once I heard what it was bred from I needed to try it. my favorite part of vaping it was the frostiness after I exhale similar to ice queen, it's always refreshing. the smell has a very strong sweet and berry scent which I enjoy. I sometimes just sniff the jar just to smell that scent again. the high is relaxing and easily lulls you to sleep. this is more of a daytime flower, howev...â€
â€œI rarely indulge in indica dominant strains, but this strain is making me consider trying others.  Feels like a vacation.   Relaxing, dreamy, smile inducing.  So nice.â€
â€œMy second favorite strain behind Jack Herer. This strain made me laugh for hours! This is great with company be prepared to laugh at any and everything.â€
â€œLovely smell and lovely high. Can make me feel off key, now and then but that's just me. Great bud!â€
â€œHad a great evening with friends just chilling out and chatting.  Perfection!â€

â€œVery likely the greatest high I've ever had.
It doesn't kick in until about two minutes after inhale (through a bong with an ash catch and a perc), but my friends and I all agree that it's some of the best weed we've ever had.
For me, the thing that distinguishes Blue Venom from all other weed is that after you smoke it you feel as if the place you are at that moment is exactly where you're supposed to be, and there'...â€

â€œGood Meds. Rolls in slow, but hangs around for a while with right amount relaxation to kill the pain. But not to the point of couch lock. Higher doses can produce a mildly trancy effect, so beware of dosage. All around, great for use day or evening for normal activities around the house or sharing with other patients. Oh! A word before you dose.......have plenty of drinks ready, this is thirsty stuff.â€

â€œThis is by far one of my favorite strains.  Very relaxing, stress-relieving strain.  I normally use a vaporizer and this strain is about as smooth as it gets.  Takes a few minutes to kick in, then it's off to Chillville.â€

â€œVery likely the greatest high I've ever had.

â€œBy far one of my favorite hybrids I will always be down for that blue venom the white widow genetics create an atmosphere that is unlike any other.  I can focus and actually be medicated while working, getting stuff done and going out to have some fun I am medicinally healthy and pharmaceutical free because of strains like this :) ;)â€

â€œThis bud really gives you a relaxed feeling, I went from extremely to giggly to mellowed out, really just a relaxing feel for it. Great to help you get to bed or battle anxiety, easily one of the top 5 strains in my opinion.â€

â€œThis stuff is for real. It takes quite a while for the effects to stop. Creeper is not the word I don't think. Thank you G-13. GENIUSâ€
â€œGood hybrid. Not great or superb, yet still worth the smoke...just not at full price at this shop anywayâ€
â€œthis was good, but not as good as it could be. the ride sort of had an uneventful peak, rather, unexpected plateau.â€

â€œDefinetly worth a try!
The smell is very lovely, fruity or berry like.
 I smoked it out of my semi clean/semi dirty water bong and it was very fruity (best way to describe it lol)
You're going to want a glass of your favorite juice with you for this one hahahah.
That being said this strain is definetly strong and will leave you relaxed after a long day of work.â€
â€œIt was really good. I enjoyed this strain alot. Great for a night's rest!â€
â€œConcentrate vaporized in an Amber Industries cartridge.Nice smooth blueberry and pine taste,with a relaxing buzz.I hope to get my hands on some of this flower.I want to smell and see the buds.â€
â€œWonderful taste and smell.  Had my and my friends talking and connecting without feeling overly giggly or chatty.  Perfect evening on this stuff.â€

â€œI highly recommend people to smoke Blue Venom it helps me sleep at night and it helps my stress, and my anxiety. It helped me focus in school and I actually complete work when I'm high from smoking Blue Venomâ€
â€œbig variety when it comes to indicasâ€
â€œVery nice and relaxing but provides great pain relief, makes you laugh, get creative and yet I can still think clearlyâ€
â€œNeed to say that this strain works with me. 5 stars. Like the taste, like the height, no red eyes. Awesomeâ€

â€œLooked nice. But not very strong. I didnt really get much of the indica high from the blueberry but abit of relaxation from the whitewidow. For a good price...$5 or $6 a gram would be fair. But not the best. A good daytime smoke for a quick relaxation though on a budget.â€
